author: Source: Malvern Gazette
title: Kenny Dalglish impressed by new Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp's... - Malvern Gazette
text:
The 48-year-old German addressed the media on Friday morning for the first time since his appointment was confirmed. He described himself as "the normal one" and said he was committed to "full throttle" football - a philosophy he built in seven successful years at Borussia Dortmund before leaving earlier this year.
 Malvern Gazette.
